title: Ticket #4717: io_proxy (chirp) server in starter advertises incorrect address
description:
The io_proxy advertises "the local" IP address, instead of the IP address to which it actually bound its listen socket. This can cause grief in a multi-protocol world.

Also, instead of checking to see that a connection came from "the local" IP address, bind to loopback and verify that, instead.
check_ins: 2014-Nov-12 13:47   Check-in [41638]: (#4717) The IO proxy (chirp server) in the starter now behaves more sanely in a multiprotocol world. (By Todd L Miller )
